recommendations.title: Enhance Login Button Visibility
recommendations.description: Increase the size and contrast of the login button to make it more prominent on the page
recommendations.expected_impact: Higher login conversion rate and reduced user frustration
recommendations.justification: Users reported difficulty finding the login button in feedback

before_after.before: Small, low-contrast button blending with the page
before_after.after: Larger, high-contrast button that stands out visually

recommendations.title: Simplify Login Form
recommendations.description: Reduce the number of form fields to only those essential for login
recommendations.expected_impact: Faster login process and improved user experience
recommendations.justification: Analysis shows users spending excessive time on the login form

before_after.before: Complex form with multiple fields and options
before_after.after: Streamlined form with only username/email and password fields

recommendations.title: Improve Error Messaging
recommendations.description: Make error messages more specific and helpful, placing them directly next to the relevant field
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduced login failures and user frustration
recommendations.justification: Session recordings show users making repeated login attempts with the same errors

before_after.before: Generic error messages at the top of the form
before_after.after: Specific, actionable error messages next to each problematic field

implementation_notes: Focus on simplifying the login experience while maintaining security. Consider adding social login options.
general_observations: This page requires optimization primarily in usability and clarity. Current design has functional elements but needs refinement in visual hierarchy and user guidance. Note: These recommendations are based on generated sample data since real analytics data was not available.
